dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4369892W] DCMA: abuse copyright
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, June 01, 2007 4:38 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4369892W] DCMA: abuse copyright ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DCMA: abuse copyright Added by system at Friday, Jun 1 2007 09:36 pm X-MailFrom: adepi.orgbr@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Jun 1 21:36:38 2007 Received: (qmail 27194 invoked by alias); 2 Jun 2007 02:36:37 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 27191 invoked from network); 2 Jun 2007 02:36:37 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 2 Jun 2007 02:36:37 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 01 Jun 2007 21:36:38 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from adepi.orgbr@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HuJTp-0002ax-Qe for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Fri, 01 Jun 2007 21:36:37 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 1 Jun 2007 21:36:33 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 1 Jun 2007 21:36:33 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from adepi.orgbr@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HuJTl-0002w3-81 for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 01 Jun 2007 21:36:33 -0500 Received: from an-out-0708.google.com ([209.85.132.243]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from adepi.orgbr@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HuJTW-0000ir-TY for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 01 Jun 2007 21:36:18 -0500 Received: by an-out-0708.google.com with SMTP id b2so253037ana for ; Fri, 01 Jun 2007 19:36:15 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=domainkey-signature:received:received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=dZjVK/Pb2E4W1i9GD56PXEmnC3NpYLVxUKJy7nUdO4ea6DCjQ96+h4+knbDcdpovUHkoxhd52x02UE4H7aGELCyNKBN8F6PX6pHG6IISPsBZhvPKAR30p5+gfVS76ozyFhs8hFfEtrNUYlgor6uhUSR1M5yIfCw0T7VgEbYO7Zk= DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=LUGFjFtdhbuf9Wsy8MMhpr8LGByqsNDgOUWDkCog6x8ogQJoGvSQs8ooHFEK4O1I39tyJ6Tnx3c+Vpkt3iVMUcYA9tqDTJ03Hsvu6UgnkfOegwES3iebsqT9VX1fNO0bTo9r7Lo51kilwgKj239HCW5YE3rrOOhJ/XEjv44GWsk= Received: by 10.100.59.20 with SMTP id h20mr1386604ana.1180751774192; Fri, 01 Jun 2007 19:36:14 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.100.108.4 with HTTP; Fri, 1 Jun 2007 19:36:14 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <7dc83d520706011936s361acaa9h1d9c668d23a47d46@mail.gmail.com> Date: Fri, 1 Jun 2007 23:36:14 -0300 From: "Adepi orgbr" To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: DCMA: abuse copyright MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_21373_1884151.1180751774175" Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 209.85.132.243 as permitted sender) client-ip=209.85.132.243; envelope-from=adepi.orgbr@gmail.com; helo=an-out-0708.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Jun 2007 02:36:33.0443 (UTC) FILETIME=[D567A730:01C7A4BE] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear ThePlanet, ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies: Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. Disney Enterprises, Inc. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc. Paramount Pictures Corporation TriStar Pictures, Inc. Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation United Artists Pictures, Inc. United Artists Corporation Universal City Studios, LLLP Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. We have received information that you are apparently providing Internet access to and possibly hosting pirate material at url: http://www.wabr.info which is offering copyrighted motion picture. The distribution of unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Brazilian Copyright Law # 9610/98 and Criminal Code, section 184. This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations. We request that you do the following: 1) Disable access to this site; 2) Remove this site from your server; and 3) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement. By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site and/or email account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the conduct complained of herein. On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, that we have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law. Also, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification. Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email should you have any questions. We thank you for your cooperation in this matter. Your prompt response is requested. Respectfully -- ADEPI - Associação de Defesa da Propriedade Intelectual www.adepi.org.br Fax (55) (11) 3828-1559 MIME element (text/html)
Dear ThePlanet,

ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who
represents the following motion picture production and distribution
companies:

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.
Disney Enterprises, Inc.
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc.
Paramount Pictures Corporation
TriStar Pictures, Inc.
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
United Artists Pictures, Inc.
United Artists Corporation
Universal City Studios, LLLP
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.



We have received information that you are apparently providing Internet
access to and possibly hosting pirate material at url:

http://www.wabr.info

which is offering copyrighted motion picture. The distribution of
unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright
infringement under the Brazilian Copyright Law # 9610/98 and Criminal
Code, section 184. This conduct may also violate the laws of other
countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations.

We request that you do the following:

1) Disable access to this site;
2) Remove this site from your server; and
3) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse
Policy/Terms of Service Agreement.

By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site
and/or email account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the
conduct complained of herein.

On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the
copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, that we
have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained
of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or
the law.

Also, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that the information in
this notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf
of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this
notification.

Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email
should you have any questions.

We thank you for your cooperation in this matter. Your prompt response is
requested.

Respectfully



--
ADEPI - Associação de Defesa da Propriedade Intelectual
www.adepi.org.br
Fax (55) (11) 3828-1559
MIME element (text/plain)
